Reviews.Title: Amazing phone at this price
Reviews.Author: Paritosh
Reviews.Content: My wife is a Blackberry fan and when we found this one for the offered price we could not resist. The phone works fabulously !! Processor is fast and neat camera too. I got the sealed box and was happy to see the excellent condition even the outer box was in. It gives you a feel of having a truly high class product.

Reviews.Title: Purchase of used blackberry bold 9700
Reviews.Author: henri calixte
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine.  It load faster than most blackberry phones.  I love it!  I would recommend it to anyone!
